text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem measure-data-usage

Last updated: 2024-04-24 00:00:00+0000

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-data-usage defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
supplemental-data Supplemental DataThe data is intended to be provided as additional information alongside the measure results.
risk-adjustment-factor Risk Adjustment FactorThe data is intended to be used to calculate and apply a risk adjustment model for the measure.

name: MeasureDataUsage
title: MeasureDataUsage
description: The intended usage for supplemental data elements in the measure.

concept.definition: The data is intended to be provided as additional information alongside the measure results.
The data is intended to be used to calculate and apply a risk adjustment model for the measure.
